Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier track problem near Granville. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier track problem near Granville.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
